content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":78341,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝たなければいけません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We must win.\""},{"lineNumber":78342,"originalJapaneseLine":"言葉の勇猛さとは裏腹に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Contrary to the boldness of the words,"},{"lineNumber":78343,"originalJapaneseLine":"香姫の顔には希望の色は薄い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kouhime's face showed little color of hope."},{"lineNumber":78344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":78345,"originalJapaneseLine":"JAPAN――","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN――"},{"lineNumber":78346,"originalJapaneseLine":"尾張にある織田城、","translatedEnglishLine":"Oda Castle in Owari,"},{"lineNumber":78347,"originalJapaneseLine":"懐かしい城でランスが目を覚ます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance wakes up in the familiar castle."},{"lineNumber":78348,"originalJapaneseLine":"バラオ山脈――","translatedEnglishLine":"Barao Mountain Range――"},{"lineNumber":78349,"originalJapaneseLine":"砂漠にほど近い岩山、","translatedEnglishLine":"A rocky mountain near the desert,"},{"lineNumber":78350,"originalJapaneseLine":"その中にある新しい砦でランスが目を覚ます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance wakes up in a new fortress within it."},{"lineNumber":78351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ……ねむねむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuwaa... so sleepy...\""},{"lineNumber":78352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん、ランス様、動かないで下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Rance-sama, please don't move."},{"lineNumber":78353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寝癖が直せないです。ぱっ、ぱっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't fix your bed hair. Pat, pat.\""},{"lineNumber":78354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、男前に仕上げろよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, make me look handsome."},{"lineNumber":78355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ俺様は元から男前だから軽い仕事だろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'm handsome from the start, so it's an easy job.\""},{"lineNumber":78356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはようございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning.\""},{"lineNumber":78357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「食事の支度に参りましたー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've come to prepare your meal—\""},{"lineNumber":78358,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いつもありがとうございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, thank you as always.\""},{"lineNumber":78359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、これも仕事ですので」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, this is part of my job.\""},{"lineNumber":78360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それではご飯並べますねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, I'll arrange the meal—\""},{"lineNumber":78361,"originalJapaneseLine":"片方はニコニコと、","translatedEnglishLine":"One smiling cheerfully,"},{"lineNumber":78362,"originalJapaneseLine":"片方は静かに朝食の準備を進める。","translatedEnglishLine":"The other quietly proceeded with breakfast preparations."},{"lineNumber":78363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm?"},{"lineNumber":78364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか違和感が」","translatedEnglishLine":"Something feels off.\""},{"lineNumber":78365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ、ビスケッタさんはどうした？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right, where is Biscetta-san?"},{"lineNumber":78366,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつも、こういうときは彼女が来たもんだが」","translatedEnglishLine":"She always comes at times like this.\""},{"lineNumber":78367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、それ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, that..."},{"lineNumber":78368,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もしかして、知らないの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You don't know, do you?\""},{"lineNumber":78369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":78370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":78371,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":78372,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":78373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どりゃああああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Doryaaaaaa!"},{"lineNumber":78374,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウルザちゃん！　ウルザちゃんはいるかー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Urza-chan! Is Urza-chan here!?"},{"lineNumber":78375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃあああ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaa!?"},{"lineNumber":78376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、おじ様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"O-ojisama!?"},{"lineNumber":78377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どうしたのですか、いったい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what's going on, exactly...?\""},{"lineNumber":78378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前らは知っていたのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you guys know?"},{"lineNumber":78379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――ビスケッタさんが行方不明なこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"—that Biscetta-san is missing?\""},{"lineNumber":78380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":78381,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……知ってしまいましたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So you know.\""},{"lineNumber":78382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知ってしまいましたか、だとぉ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You know, huh!?\""},{"lineNumber":78383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「兄様、やめて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Brother, please stop.\""},{"lineNumber":78384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、香ちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, Kou-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":78385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……兄様や状況が落ち着くまでは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Until brother and the situation calm down,"},{"lineNumber":78386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この件は伏せておこうと言ったのは私です」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was the one who said to keep this matter quiet.\""},{"lineNumber":78387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦いに敗れ、ランス城を奪われ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Defeated in battle, with Rance Castle taken..."},{"lineNumber":78388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その上ビスケッタさんまで、と……","translatedEnglishLine":"And on top of that, Biscetta-san too..."},{"lineNumber":78389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すみません、話す勇気がなかったんです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry, I didn't have the courage to speak...\""},{"lineNumber":78390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝たなければいけません」
言葉の勇猛さとは裏腹に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contrary to the boldness of the words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫の顔には希望の色は薄い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kouhime's face showed little color of hope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPAN――
尾張にある織田城、
懐かしい城でランスが目を覚ます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance wakes up in the familiar castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バラオ山脈――
砂漠にほど近い岩山、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A rocky mountain near the desert,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中にある新しい砦でランスが目を覚ます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance wakes up in a new fortress within it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわぁ……ねむねむ……」
「あん、ランス様、動かないで下さい。
寝癖が直せないです。ぱっ、ぱっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't fix your bed hair. Pat, pat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、男前に仕上げろよ。
まあ俺様は元から男前だから軽い仕事だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'm handsome from the start, so it's an easy job."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おはようございます」
「食事の支度に参りましたー」
「あ、いつもありがとうございます」
「いえ、これも仕事ですので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is part of my job."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それではご飯並べますねー」
片方はニコニコと、
片方は静かに朝食の準備を進める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other quietly proceeded with breakfast preparations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか違和感が」
「そうだ、ビスケッタさんはどうした？
いつも、こういうときは彼女が来たもんだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She always comes at times like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、それ……
もしかして、知らないの？」
「どりゃああああああ！
ウルザちゃん！　ウルザちゃんはいるかー！？」
「きゃあああ！？
お、おじ様！？」
「ど、どうしたのですか、いったい……」
「お前らは知っていたのか？」
「――ビスケッタさんが行方不明なこと」
「……知ってしまいましたか」
「知ってしまいましたか、だとぉ！？」
「兄様、やめて下さい」
「む、香ちゃん」
「……兄様や状況が落ち着くまでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until brother and the situation calm down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この件は伏せておこうと言ったのは私です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was the one who said to keep this matter quiet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いに敗れ、ランス城を奪われ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Defeated in battle, with Rance Castle taken...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その上ビスケッタさんまで、と……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And on top of that, Biscetta-san too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみません、話す勇気がなかったんです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry, I didn't have the courage to speak..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'm handsome from the start, so it's an easy job."

「食事の支度に参りましたー」
「あ、いつもありがとうございます」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is part of my job."

「そうだ、ビスケッタさんはどうした？
いつも、こういうときは彼女が来たもんだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She always comes at times like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、それ……
もしかして、知らないの？」
「どりゃああああああ！
ウルザちゃん！　ウルザちゃんはいるかー！？」

お、おじ様！？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until brother and the situation calm down,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And on top of that, Biscetta-san too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみません、話す勇気がなかったんです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sorry, I didn't have the courage to speak..."
